type fpi1

clear
r1 = -0.52169174760555;
steps = 20;
x(1) = 0.5;
for i=1:steps
	x(i+1) = x(i)^3 - exp(cos(x(i))) + 2;
end
err = x - r1;
for i=1:steps
	ratio(i) = err(i+1)/err(i);
end
ratio(steps+1) = 0;
table = [x' err' ratio']

type fpi2

clear
r2 = 0.91127861104362;
steps = 15;
x(1) = 0.5;
for i=1:steps
	x(i+1) = (exp(cos(x(i))) + x(i) - 2)^(1/3);
end
err = x - r2;
for i=1:steps
	ratio(i) = err(i+1)/err(i);
end
ratio(steps+1) = 0;
table = [x' err' ratio']

type fpi3

clear
r3 = -1.21721705214857;
steps = 25;
x(1) = -1;
for i=1:steps
	x(i+1) = (exp(cos(x(i))) - 2)/(x(i)^2) + 1/x(i);
end
err = x - r3;
for i=1:steps
	ratio(i) = err(i+1)/err(i);
end
ratio(steps+1) = 0;
table = [x' err' ratio']

type analyze

x1 = -0.52169174;
x2 = 0.91127861;
x3 = -1.21721705;

be1 = x1.^3 - x1 + 2 - exp(cos(x1));
be2 = x2.^3 - x2 + 2 - exp(cos(x2));
be3 = x3.^3 - x3 + 2 - exp(cos(x3));

k1 = 3*x1.^2 + exp(cos(x1))*sin(x1);
k2 = (-exp(cos(x2))*sin(x2) + 1) / (3*(exp(cos(x2)) + x2 - 2)^(2/3));
k3 = (x3*sin(x3)*exp(cos(x3)) + 2*exp(cos(x3)) + x3 - 4) / x3.^3;

fpi1

table =
